website_summaries.verdict: Taking cues from previous New Balance 574 sneakers, this shoe boasts a comfortable feel and an amazing fit. Add to that, this shoe is also durable and can withstand long walks. It is one of the New Balance sneakers that has a classic vibe yet fashion-forward aesthetic. A true eye candy, this shoe can jazz up an ordinary OOTD and will make heads turn without being too flashy.
pros: Many of those who own a pair of New Balance 574 Pebbled Sport were happy that they get compliments when wearing the shoe
A lot of wearers found this sneaker to be very comfortable
This New Balance 574 model is easy to break into, based on several reviews
This sneaker provides a great fit, according to some users
More than a few people mentioned that the design of this sneaker does not go out of style
One person considered the New Balance 574 Pebbled Sport as a great go-anywhere, walk-anywhere shoe
A few can attest that this sneaker can significantly hold up even after walking for 6 to 8 miles on a daily basis
A commenter was happy that the New Balance 574 Pebbled Sport is available in wide width
cons: The NB 574 Pebbled Sport does not have enough heel cushioning, according to a couple of testers
Some consumers wanted the shoe to have more support

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Size 9,5 US , but width 2 E !!! Very and very comfortable ! Color very hot and beautiful ! Never seen before same in my city )
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Classic 574
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and comfortable. They feel lighter than my previous pair but overall they are comfortable and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress House

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers run small.  Very small
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking sneakers but, the sizing (I take a 10M) is off by a full measure. I ordered a half size bigger than normal and one size wider but, it still wasn't enough room for comfortable walking and they pinched the heel, toes and sides of my foot. The toe of the shoe is very narrow. I find these to be very, very small sneakers and I may try ordering a full size larger and wider. Maybe that will do the trick!!!
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Orange & Blue
customer_reviews.text: Order a size up. GO GATORS. I'm a size 14 wide all day long. So if you struggle with 13 & up. You know a 14 regular is a 13 wide. A 15 regular is a 14 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Carhauler

customer_reviews.title: Crappy - ripped two wears in
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Just bought these as a birthday gift for my husband and his second time wearing them he noticed this big hole. Really frustrated since they were pricey and have barely been worn.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Zulauf

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice but are as basic as I remember them as a kid. A little tight for wider feet I would imagine. Not the most comfortable workout shoes I own but can get it done. Great for casual wear when it's appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: BUSHBILL

customer_reviews.title: Awful sneakers
customer_reviews.text: So, I decided to write the review, as these sneakers disappointed me extremely. I bought them at the end of July, but at the beginning of autumn they started tearing on the surface, although I did not wear them too often. In the photo it is possible to see that they look nice and like new. I bought similar sneakers in Tenerife, wore them almost every day and they did not tear at all! So, this purchase disappointed me and I do not recommend these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim

customer_reviews.title: New Balance is a great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome, but even better is the amazing service Amazon Prime offers. We had to return a pair that were to small and reordered a size larger. It couldn't have been easier. In one day one pair was on the way back and the correct size was on it's way here.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Their ok. Not to loose width wise, but close. Not to tight in the toe, but close. No arch support at all.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Kicks!
customer_reviews.text: These classic New Balances are both comfy and stylish. I even added in some Walk Hero inserts and can walk for days in these super comfortable trainers!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits and wears just like any other new balance shoe. Quality made and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing 574s for about 15 years. The V2 is a bit tighter than the previous v1 but they still have tons of support and last.
customer_reviews.author: Jc NJ

customer_reviews.title: This is not a 2E
customer_reviews.text: I am a Size 1E; The shoe started to hurt after wearing it for a short time. I compared the size to my other New Balance and there is a significant difference in width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received a lot of compliments. Great shoe will order more
customer_reviews.author: Kara Choyce

customer_reviews.title: Greatest sneaker ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only sneakers that I never have to break in. I'm a New Balance 574 girl for life.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Good choice, buy a size larger
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good but consider that they are kind of small. For instance, my average feet size is 7.0, so I ordered 7.5 and I think I should order 8.0, but they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Andres Luzardo

customer_reviews.title: No insoles in the shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine but there were no insoles in the shoe? I couldn't return because I was going on a trip. I had to buy some at Walgreens for 10 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lozoya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and provide walking support for broken foot and broken leg.
customer_reviews.author: David Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Not good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 month ago, just used three or four times and they got broken!! Not a good product and I can’t change them!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: First pair of New Balance shoes and so far very satisfied with it. Very comfortable and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: NB shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my new NB shoes everything I expected thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: It's not a very supportive shoe.
customer_reviews.text: No real likes or dislikes, it's just an ok shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can always count on Amazon for the best results.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a huge fan of new balance..so I had huge confidence that they would fit just perfect.Thank you amazon 😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: The shoe does fit great well I always purchase New Balance and it the depends on which one you get 574 is my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lord

customer_reviews.title: Request to exchange for a 10 wide
customer_reviews.text: Please allow me to exchange these shoes for a 10 wide. I can not fit these
customer_reviews.author: Daron Scott

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were the wrong size an too small but decided to keep BC at the time was the only thing for my child to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Williams

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Iconic 574 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Probably, the most famous shoe in the history of New Balance. The 574 is a clean and classic stamped EVA runner that uses encapsulated cushioning. Updated with snakeskin printed midsole and snakeskin deburring plastic
feature_bullets: Iconic: the New Balance 574v2 sneakers boast the best of retro style and modern Design elements. Featuring the signature silhouette sneaker heads have loved since the '80s, these iconic sneakers are a must-have in your shoe closet
High-tech: 574v2 have built-in technology for long-term wearability. Encap midsole cushioning combines soft foam with a durable polyurethane rim to deliver all-day support

Comfortable construction: these Sneakers are crafted for your comfort. They feature a lightweight upper so your foot won't feel constricted and a foam cushioned heel for a cloud-like feel. The rubber outsole is built to last wear after wear

Nb heritage: put on these retro sneakers and feel The New Balance craftsmanship that made them a STREET style favorite. The bold color blocking and large n logo remain in this modern version of a classic shoe

Wear with anything: in true New Balance form, the 574v2 can be worn with anything from jeans and a tee to sweats and a tank. These casual shoes can add a sporty touch to your more dressed-up looks or show off your style when you're looking laid-back
